author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
In this Creation, you'll meet the Cryomancers, a new faction that uses Cryogenics in all their technology to slow, freeze, and break anyone that stands against them. 

Complete a mission that will take you through their headquarters and discover new companions, POIs, weapons, a new ship, and custom player home along the way.

Get more info here: http://beth.games/45u7SR1
title: Starfield Creation spotlight: Cryomancers – A New Faction by zone79 #starfield
